greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A268389(A001969(1+n)); A268389 without its zero terms.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..32768
mathematica: f[n_] := Which[n == 1, 0, OddQ@ #, 0, EvenQ@ #, 1 + f[#/2]] &@ Fold[BitXor, n, Quotient[n, 2^Range[BitLength@ n - 1]]];
Array[f, {240}] /. 0 -> Nothing (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Feb 12 2016, after _Jan Mangaldan_ at A006068 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 10 2016
